product_name: Nathan Sonic Grip Samsung Galaxy S4 Phone Holster
long_description: The Nathan Sonic Grip Samsung Galaxy S4 Phone Holster helps keep your phone protected in the palm of your hand without tiring your muscles or chafing your skin. Fully adjustable hand strap and thumbhole offer grip-free running. Performance textiles deliver enduring protection and chafe-free support. Reflective hits on the Nathan Sonic Grip Samsung Galaxy S4 Phone Holster promote low-light visibility up to 1,200 ft.
short_description: The Nathan Sonic Grip Samsung Galaxy S4 Phone Holster helps keep your phone protected in the palm of your hand without tiring your muscles or chafing your skin.
